The sound-hearted Christian, or, A treatise of soundness of heart with several other sermons ... / by William Greenhill. Greenhill, William, 1591-1671.
[7], 319 p.
Printed for Nath. Crouch ..., London : 1670.
Errata: p. [7]. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. (from t.p.) Of believing -- Of being of Christs mind -- Of doing all in his name -- Of the preciousness of the word -- Of the sweetness of the word -- Against the love of the world.
=======

[7], 319 p.
Printed for Nath. Crouch ..., London : 1670.
Errata: p. [7]. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. (from t.p.) Of believing -- Of being of Christs mind -- Of doing all in his name -- Of the preciousness of the word -- Of the sweetness of the word -- Against the love of the world.
